item.description:
This 2013 Svedka Ice Bar will be bigger and better then ever and is being billed as one of the "Largest Ice Bars in the country"!

FIFTY THOUSAND POUNDS of ICE will be used to create three separate bars in the central courtyard, various ice luges, and carvings for photo opportunities.

 

This year's theme will be "The year of The Shark"!

This will be coming to a end for the 2013 season and won't be back til' next year! So I hope to see you there. It's going to be fun with everything going on; all the Ice sculptures/bars, exotic drinks, barbecue, live band (for dancing outside? Wooo!), light show, etc!

I've never been to one of these but have always dreamed of going. What about you? Didn't knew there was one so close, and it just happens to be the BIGGEST in the COUNTRY! Hey, Let's have some fun, and as my mother always said; "Go play outside!!!"

 

Activities include:

-> a full color light show, colorfully lighting the entire courtyard
-> Josh Logan Band
-> Chillin' & Grillin' food court on the patio with sausage & peppers and chicken skewers
-> Hot Chocolate "spirited" drinks
-> This year has there's an all new drink menu w/ the best martinis ever using Svedka Vodka!
-> Ice cold beer on tap and wine by the glass
-> New for this year is a full bar featuring your favorite mixed drinks made under the stars

$5 admission. Tokens for everything sold at the Ice Bar are available at the front desk of the Inn.

STARTS @ 5:00 PM and continues to 10:00 PM
Dress warm and enjoy the GREAT New Hampshire outdoors at the 2013 Svedka Ice Bar @ the Bedford Village Inn!


Get there early, before 5:00 PM if you can to avoid the lines for tokens OR buy them before the event anytime.
item.how_to_find_us: See your emails & postings below.............. My Cell # (603) 759-9876

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)
